Hello, this is Eldon Franco from Cherokee ISD. We miss our students, and hope you are all well. This important message about COVID-19 will help to keep you safe and healthy. The most important...

Per Governor Abbott's Executive Order, April 17, 2020, school buildings will not reopen the remainder of the 19-20 school year.
Online learning will continue until the end of the school calendar year, May 21, 2020. As the district receives news, information will be sent out.

#COVID19 vive en los pulmones de las personas con el virus, incluso si no tienen síntomas. Use una máscara, manténgase a 6 pies de distancia y lávese las manos.
#COVID19 lives in the lungs of people with the virus, even if they don’t have symptoms. If you can’t stay home, wear a mask, stay 6 feet apart, and wash hands.
